document.full_text: the women ended their losing streak on "american idol" on thursday as paul mcdonald became the first male contestant this season to be eliminated from the top 13 of the top-rated tv talent show.
document.title: "american idol" women end losing streak, mcdonald out
lines_and_colors: the women ended their losing streak on "american idol" on thursday as paul mcdonald became the first male contestant this season to be eliminated from the top 13 of the top-rated tv talent show.
